summary: This test module verifies the correctness of the plotâ€‘matching and rendering utilities used by DVC. It checks that flat datapoint errors are detected, that plot group definitions are interpreted properly, that the appropriate renderer is selected for each plot type, and that plot properties are correctly merged from multiple configuration files and revisions.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable generation of visualizations in DVC by validating the logic that matches plot definitions to renderers and consolidates plot metadata across different sources, thereby preventing rendering failures and ensuring consistent reporting of data insights.
